OOC: I'm getting snowed in around here so you may not hear much from
me - I have the family to look after.

However don't forget, the maximals and Autobots in the battle against
Hydras and his troops should be feeling the fear effects from Phobia's
attack. It basically brings a person's greatest fears to the surface.
IE if your character is afraid of clowns, then the enemies might start
to look like clowns temporarilly. Another affect it could have is
create a temporary phobia. Maybe fear of open places, fear of
lightning (Which would probrably be fear of these explosions here in
battle). It's up to you, be creative!

It's only temporary. :)

Preston.
